alert.note: Alert for Jersey; Madison (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 19 at 11:40AM CDT until May 19 at 12:15PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 PM CDT FOR WEST CENTRAL MADISON AND SOUTH CENTRAL JERSEY COUNTIES IN SOUTHWESTERN ILLINOIS...NORTHEASTERN ST. CHARLES AND NORTHERN ST. LOUIS COUNTIES IN EAST CENTRAL MISSOURI... At 1139 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Maryland Heights, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. At 1128 AM Spirit of St. Louis Airport reported a 60 mph wind. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... University City, Overland, Clayton, Olivette, Lambert-St. Louis International Airport and Breckenridge Hills around 1145 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Florissant, Hazelwood, St. Ann, Bridgeton, Berkeley, St. John, Normandy, Northwoods, Woodson Terrace, Bel-Ridge, Ferguson, Jennings, Bellefontaine Neighbors, Dellwood, Riverview, Moline Acres, Calverton Park, Flordell Hills, Castle Point, Black Jack, Madison, Spanish Lake, Glasgow Village, Granite City, Alton, Godfrey and Hartford. This also includes First Missouri State Capitol Historic Site. This includes Interstate 70 in Missouri between exits 222 and 231. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
